settings.title: About the Ryan Pernofski Store
settings.content:
For over a decade I've been sharing my photography on various social media platforms and over this time it has reached further than I could have imagined.

I started photography to try my hand at capturing the beauty of the ocean that I grew up surfing. And I created this store to share the beauty of the ocean with you in a more tangible way than just the glow of your screen.

Every wave or "ocean-scape" on my store is selected to both compliment & transform your space.Â My aim is to blur the lines between the ocean & art.

Made for and byâ€”a lover of the ocean.
x Ryan
